1.title: Bob the train -Row row row your boat

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Do you kids know how to row a boat? Watch this nursery rhyme and learn it from your friend Bob The Train..

2.title: Bob the train -Pussy cat pussy cat

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Do you kids know where is our little pussy cat? Bob The Train is here to tell you where she is. Watch this nursery rhyme to learn more..

3.title: Bob the train -Humpty dumpty sat on a wall

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Do you kids know what happened to Humpty Dumpty when he sat on the wall? Watch this video to learn this classic nursery rhyme with you friend Bob The Train..

4.title: Bob the train -Ihear thunder

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Bob can hear thunder, can you? No worries, you can watch this video with Bob The Train and his friends and enjoy the rains..

5.title: Bob the train -Iwanna have fun

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: It is summer time in the world of frog and our five little speckled frog friends want to play by jumping into the pool. Watch this video if you kids want to learn their way of playing outside with your friend Bob The Train..

6.title: Bob the train -Five little speckled frogs

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: It is summer time in the world of frog and our five little speckled frog friends want to play by jumping into the pool. Watch this video if you kids want to learn their way of playing outside with your friend Bob The Train..

7.title: Bob the train -Hello it's halloween

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Put on your scary costumes kids as Bob The Train is here to celebrate Halloween with you children and teach you all the Hello It's Halloween song..

8.title: Bob the train -Let's bake

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Look what your friend Bob The Train is doing today. He's baking. Join him in the kitchen while he bakes his favorite pastries, puddings, cakes and crispy cookies by watching this video..

9.title: Bob the train -Things people do

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Do you kids know what things people do? Watch this cartoon video to learn what we do in our daily lives..

10.title: Bob the train -The weekend song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Wake up kids, Bob The Train is here, all energetic and ready to play and teach you children the Weekend Song..

11.title: Bob the train -Incy wincy spider

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Meet Incy Wincy Spider, an eight legged friend of Bob The Train. He's here to tell you his story of how he managed to climb the water spout. Come kids let's watch this video with Bob..

12.title: Bob the train -Scary pumpkin song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Scary Pumpkins are here at the Halloween Costume Party. Kids, don't be scared as Bob The Train is here to play with you..

13.title: Bob the train -Hickory dickory dock

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Kids. Look who is trying to run up the clock. It's the mouse. Watch Hickory Dickory to learn what else is this little mouse up-to..

14.title: Bob the train -Animals abc song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Babies, we know your parents can't always take you to the zoo because of their busy schedule. Bob The Train knows that too. And that's why he decided to bring the zoo to you. Kids, this is no ordinary zoo. All the animals are placed alphabetically..

15.title: Bob the train -Around the world

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Don't you kids want to take a tour of our pretty little world? Hop on-board as Bob The Train is here to take you all babies round the world..

16.title: Bob the train -Wheels on the bus

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Do you kids want to go round the town with your friend Bob The Train? Watch this classic nursery rhyme the Wheels On The Bus to enjoy your ride round the town..

17.title: Bob the train -London bridge

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: London Bridge is falling down. Watch this video kids and see what happens next in this nursery rhyme with your friend Bob The Train..

18.title: Bob the train -Over the mountains

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: It is such a lovely day, and Bob The Train wants to take a ride with you kids. Yes, you little kids. So come join him by watching this nursery rhyme..

19.title: Bob the train -Yankee doodle went to town

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Do you know where is Yankee Doodle? Watch this video to find out where is Yankee with your friend Bob The Train..

20.title: Bob the train -Little things we love

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Hey kids. Your friend Bob The Train is here to help you do all those little things you love to do. Come watch this video with your friend Bob..

21.title: Bob the train -Animals sound song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Have you heard a duck go quack quack quack? Have you heard a hen go cluck cluck cluck? If not then watch this animals sound song with your friend Bob The Train and sing and dance your way till the end of the song..

22.title: Bob the train -Five little ducks

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Do you kids know what are these five little ducks up-to? Your friend Bob The Train knows that these ducks want to swim all the day but now he cannot find all of them. Help him find these little ducks by watching this video..

1.title: Bob the train: Learn about vegetables

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Hi Kids. Your friend Bob the train is here to teach you all about vegetables. Do you know how many types of vegetables are available in the market? We can find onions, tomatoes, potatoes, broccoli and many more interesting veggies. So join your friend Bob the train and learn all about the various vegetables we can find all around us.

2.title: Bob the train -Learn about transport vehicles

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Hi Kids. Aren't you excited to meet your friend Bob the train? Well, today Bob is going to teach you about various transport vehicles. These vehicles can be used for transportation or for carrying goods and many more things. We're all super excited to jump on board with Bob the Train and learn about transport vehicles..

3.title: Bob the train -Counting numbers

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Hi Kids. Do you know your numbers? Your buddy Bob the train needs your help to count his numbers. Will you help him? Then hop on board, sing along and teach Bob how to count..

4.title: Bob the train -Learn colors

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Hey kids. Bob the train is back again. This time your friend is going to teach you about the various colors around us. Do you know what the color of the sky is? That's absolutely right. It's blue. Watch this video to learn about colors with your friend Bob The Train..

5.title: Bob the train -Learn about shapes

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Shapes are all around us. Can you help Bob the train learn about squares, circles, hearts, stars and many more shapes? All you need to do is watch this video and sing along with Bob The Train and learn all about shapes..

6.title: Bob the train -Learn about fruits

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Don't we all love eating fruits? Well kids, today Bob the train is going to teach you all about the various fruits you can find in the marketplace. Watch this video to learn all about fruits and season fruits with your friend Bob the train.

7.title: Bob the train -Learn about animals

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Hi Kids. Do you know about the wild animal kingdom? Bob The train is here to show you some roars, mews and woofs. See if you can name each animal in this video before Bob does..

8.title: Bob the train -Happy birthday song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The Happy Birthday Song.. What if we told you that Bob The Train has planned something special for your Birthday? Wouldn't you'll be super-excited to know what that is? We won't keep the surprise from you much longer - your best friend Bob The Train has made a super fun Happy Birthday song for your special day, so play this video and let's have some fun..

9.title: Bob the train -Number song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Hey Kids. Bob's here to teach you all about numbers. Hop on board and join us on this fun numbers learning adventure..

10.title: Bob the train -Alphabet train

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Hi Kids. Do you know your ABC's? Well babies, come on and sing along with Bob the Train in this fun and catchy alphabet learning video.

11.title: Bob the train -Adventure with numbers

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Hey Kids.. Do you want to go on a numbers adventure with Bob The Train? Well then, just shout "Yeah" and Bob will be there in no time. These naughty little numbers were playing a game of hide and seek with Bob, but now Bob can't seem to find them at all. It seems they've hidden themselves very well. Can you help Bob find them?.

12.title: Bob the train -Colors ride

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Bob the train is a fun loving train with a hoard of knowledge, and he's here to share his knowledge with you lovely kids. Today Bob will teach you babies about all fun and bright colors. Colors are important to make a dull day shine bright like the yellow sun. So why wait kids? Come and join in the fun..

13.title: Bob the train -Transport adventure

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Join Bob The Train on this Transport Adventure. You know about trains, but do you kids know any other modes of transport? Which ones drive on roads? Which ones fly in the air? What roles and duties do they perform? Don't worry kids. Watch this video and Bob will teach you all about them..

14.title: Bob the train -The wheels on the train

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Hi folks. Here's a train song for preschool kids and babies who love nursery rhymes like "The Wheels on the Bus". All aboard. Toot Toot..

15.title: Bob the train -Shapes song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Are you ready to learn about shapes? Join Bob the Train on this fun shapes learning adventure for kids.

16.title: Bob the train -Went to the farm

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: The thing with Bob is, you'll never find him in one place and today Bob has gone to the farm. What is he doing there? On his farm he has ducks, cats, dogs, sheep ,cows, horses and pigs. Bob loves his farm animals, and he wants to take you kids to his farm too. Will you join him and all his animal friends on this farm adventure?.

17.title: Bob the train -Counting numbers song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Hey kids. Bob the Train needs your help. He's trying to learn his numbers and keeps getting stuck. He really needs to know his numbers by the end of the day. He's sure that if you don't help him he won't be able to finish on time. So hurry up kids. Help Bob learn his numbers..

18.title: Bob the train -Visit to the army camp

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Hi Kids. Your friend Bob the Train is visiting the Army Camp today. Here Bob will learn about the various transport vehicles used in the army. Do you little toddlers want to join him on his adventure?.

19.title: Bob the train -Planets song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Kids, do you want to go on a planets ride with your friend Bob the Train? Then hop on board, because this train is just about to take off on a very special journey to outer space. As we go along, Bob will sing the planets song. So come on kids - play this video and learn about our solar system..

20.title: Bob the train -Building with shapes

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Are you ready kids? We are going to do something super interesting today. Your friend Bob The Train is going to build objects which we use every day. So kids, are you excited? Then what are you waiting for? Simply play this video and have a fun learning experience with Bob the train..

21.title: Bob the train -Alphabet adventure

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Do you little toddlers know your alphabets? Which alphabet comes after B? That's right kids. After B comes the letter C. All you little toddlers are super smart and so we know that you can help Bob the train in learning his alphabets too..

22.title: Bob the train -Phonics song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Bob The Train decided to make learning English super easy and plenty of fun for children with the Phonics Song. So don't wait any longer kids. Simply sing and dance and have a fun learning experience with your friend Bob the train..

23.title: Bob the train -Abc song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Learn your ABCs with Bob the Train..

24.title: Bob the train -Let's learn colors

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Hey kids, there are thousands of colors around us every day. Can you name any of them? That's right babies - red, blue, black, pink and many more. Watch this video with your friend Bob the train and learn all about colors..

1.title: Bob the train -Johny johny yes papa

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Johny wants to eat sugar all the time. Watch your friend Bob The Train catch Johny while he is busy eating sugar..

2.title: Bob the train -Head shoulders knees and toes

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Want to learn about head, shoulders, knees and toes? Listen to this kindergarten nursery rhyme to by-heart it..

3.title: Bob the train -Rain rain go away

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Little Johny wants to play outside, do you kids know what is stopping him from getting out of the house? Watch this video to learn how our friend Bob The Train helps him in getting out of his house.

4.title: Bob the train -Friendship song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: You are not alone kids, Bob The Train is here with his friends. Watch this Friendship Song and become friends with Bob and his company.

5.title: Bob the train -Cubby cheeks

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Kids. Look into the mirror, can you see your face? Now do you want to learn the parts of your face? Watch this video with your friend Bob the train.

6.title: Bob the train -Five little ducks

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Oh. Look at these Five little ducks who have a habit of swimming over the hills and far away. Can you help Bob The Train to bring these ducks back to their home?.

7.title: Bob the train -Finger family song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Do you want to meet your friend Bob The Train's family? Watch this cartoon video by Bob The Train.

8.title: Bob the train -One two buckle my shoe

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Trying to learn numbers? Bob The Train is here with his friends to teach you numbers in a playful manner..

9.title: Bob the train -If you are happy and you know it

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Bob is so happy today that he wants all of his friends to know about it by reciting If You Are Happy And You Know It. Do you kids want to learn it with him?.

10.title: Bob the train -Ten in the bed

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: These ten in bed just wants to sleep after a day's hard work, but bob the train doesn't want to share his bed with anyone. Watch Bob The Train play his trick in order to get all of the bed space.

11.title: Bob the train -Five little monkeys

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: These five little monkeys are making space for you all in their bed so that you can play and learn this nursery rhyme Five Little Monkeys with Bob The Train.

12.title: Bob the train -Bingo

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Do you all know about this playful dog Bingo? Join Bob The Train and become friends with Bingo the dog.

13.title: Bob the train -Five little babies

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Have you kids met Bob The Train and the five little babies? Watch the video above to know what these naughty babies are up to..

14.title: Bob the train -Jingle bells

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Santa Claus is dashing through the snow in his open sleigh, and he is waiting to deliver this special Jingle Bells Christmas rhyme to you toddlers. What makes this children rhyme so special? Well, it has been made by your best friend Bob the Train and his preschool buddies..

15.title: Bob the train -Rig a jig jig

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Bob The Train is out to meet and sing the Rig A Jig Jig song with his friends. Don't you kids wan to join them and have fun?.

16.title: Bob the train -Animal sound song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: This time Bob The Train brings animal sounds song for you so kids get ready to put on your dancing shoes and hit the club that plays the best nursery rhymes ever, because your favorite friend Bob The Train is playing DJ today..

17.title: Bob the train -Shapes rolling song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Our world is full of shapes. Do you kids know all of them? Watch this video and learn shapes with Bob The Train and his friends.

18.title: Bob the train -Santa finger family

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: See kids Santa Claus is here with his family to meet you little ones. Welcome this family by singling-along the Santa Finger Family song with your friend Bob The Train.

19.title: Bob the train -Three blind mice

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Today, Bob The Train brings to you kids a story about the famous Three Blind Mice. Despite being blind, the Three Blind Mice were famous for stealing their cheese and running away as fast as hurricanes. Let's Watch it.

20.title: Bob the train -Five little shapes

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Bob the Train is taking over babysitting duties for today, but he urgently needs your help. The five little shapes are refusing to go to sleep and have been jumping on the bed the entire night. They need to get some sleep or else they won't wake up on time for kindergarten tomorrow.

21.title: Bob the train -Marry had a little lamb

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Don't you all kids want to know about Mary and her little lamb? Watch this video Mary Had A Little Lamb with Bob The Train.

22.title: Bob the train -Crayons color song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Learn the various colors which we see around us everyday through these crayons only with your friend Bob The Train..

23.title: Bob the train -Miss polly had a dolly

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Miss Polly's Dolly has become sick. Kids, do you know who has come to her rescue? It's our friend Bob The Train.

24.title: Bob the train -Teddy bear

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: It's not just you kids who study or play, even your teddy bears go to school and polish their shoes. Don't you children want to see how your teddy bears manage to do all of this? Watch this nursery rhyme with your friend Bob The Train.

25.title: Bob the train -Opposites song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: While crossing a road don't you look at your left and right? Do you kids know that these words are called the opposite words. Watch this cartoon video to learn more of these opposite words.

26.title: Bob the train -Little bo peep

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

26.plot: Kids. Little Bo Peep has lost her sheep and she doesn't know where to find them. Will you help Bob The Train is locating Little Bo Peep's sheep? All you have to do is play the video above babies..

27.title: Bob the train -We go song

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

27.plot: Join Bob The Train and his friends as they go away through the sea, through the storm, through the snow and sing-along this classic nursery rhyme We Go. We Go. We Go..

28.title: Bob the train -The land of magical colors

episode of.title: Bob the Train: Nursery Rhymes and Kids Songs (TV Series 2013– )

28.plot: Kids. Can you imagine a world without the lovely colors? No blue sky. No yellow sun. It would be a disaster. Unfortunately, in the land of rhymes where our friends live, their worst nightmare came true. They woke up one day to find all the bright colors wiped off from their land. Taken away by the Color Monster..

imdb.plot outline: Nursery rhymes, baby videos and kids songs that your kindergartener can sing and dance to all day long. Enjoy this collection of Bob the Train's popular learning animations for preschoolers. Bob the Train introduces your toddlers to a variety of classic nursery rhymes as well as original kids songs and learning videos for a wholesome and fun way to learn the basics of life. See you inside.
